body_html:
In addition, I'm able to pull in S_IREAD and S_IWRITE from a simple toy example:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <sys/stat.h>

int main()
{

int FileHandle;

FileHandle = S_IREAD;
printf("FileHandle: %d\n",FileHandle);
FileHandle = S_IWRITE;
printf("FileHandle: %d\n",FileHandle);

return 0;

}
$ gcc test.c 
$ ./a.out 
FileHandle: 256
FileHandle: 128

Any idea why Tensorflow might behave differently?
